remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [XML 数据源Sources of XML Data](#source_of_xml_data) - [正在更新的 XML 数据Updating XML Data](#updating_xml_data) - [指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [使用 XPath 表达式进行筛选Filtering using an XPath Expression](#filtering_using_an_xpath_expression) - [缓存Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [数据视图对象Data View Object](#data_view_object) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是一个数据源控件，显示的数据绑定控件的 XML 数据。The control is a data source control that presents XML data to data-bound controls. 控件可以使用数据绑定控件，以显示层次结构和表格数据。The control can be used by data-bound controls to display both hierarchical and tabular data. 控件通常用于在只读方案中显示层次结构的 XML 数据。The control is typically used to display hierarchical XML data in read-only scenarios. 因为控件扩展类，它适用于层次结构数据。Because the control extends the class, it works with hierarchical data. 控件还实现接口，并适用于表格或列表样式、 数据。The control also implements the interface and works with tabular, or list-style, data. > [!NOTE] > 出于安全考虑，没有任何控件属性存储视图状态中。For security purposes, none of the control properties are stored in view state. 由于这是技术上可行，客户端的视图状态的内容进行解码，存储的数据结构或其内容的敏感信息可能会带来导致信息泄露威胁。Since it is technically possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the data structure or its contents could expose you to an information disclosure threat. 请注意，如果你需要存储信息，如属性视图状态中，你可以启用加密，以通过设置保护的内容上`@ Page`指令。Note that if you need to store information such as property in view state, you can enable encryption to protect the contents by setting on the `@ Page` directive. 页上，开发人员使用控件来显示使用数据绑定控件的 XML 数据。Page developers use the control to display XML data using data-bound controls. ## XML 数据源Sources of XML Data 通常从 XML 文件，由指定加载的 XML 数据属性。The typically loads XML data from an XML file, which is specified by the property. 此外可以直接通过在字符串窗体中使用的数据源控件存储 XML 数据属性。XML data can also be stored directly by the data source control in string form using the property. 如果你想要将 XML 数据转换的数据绑定控件显示之前，你可以为转换提供可扩展样式表语言 (XSL) 样式表。If you want to transform the XML data before it is displayed by a data-bound control, you can provide an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) style sheet for the transformation. 用于 XML 数据中，你从文件通常加载样式表，如由属性，但你可以将其存储中直接使用的字符串形式属性。As with the XML data, you typically load the style sheet from a file, indicated by the property, but you can also store it in string form directly using the property. ## 正在更新的 XML 数据Updating XML Data 控件是方案中常用只读数据的数据绑定控件显示 XML 数据的位置。The control is commonly used in read-only data scenarios where a data-bound control displays XML data. 但是，你还可以使用控件编辑 XML 数据。However, you can also use the control to edit XML data. 若要编辑的 XML 数据，调用方法来检索是 XML 数据的内存中表示的对象。To edit the XML data, call the method to retrieve an object that is an in-memory representation of the XML data. 你可以使用公开的对象模型和对象它包含或使用 XPath 筛选表达式来操作文档中的数据。You can use the object model exposed by the and objects it contains or use an XPath filtering expression to manipulate data in the document. 当对 XML 数据的内存中表示进行了更改时，你可以保存它以通过调用磁盘方法。When you have made changes to the in-memory representation of the XML data, you can save it to disk by calling the method. 有一些限制到的编辑功能控件：There are some restrictions to the editing capabilities of the control: - 必须从所指示的 XML 文件加载 XML 数据属性，不是从 XML 中指定的内联属性。The XML data must be loaded from an XML file that is indicated by the property, not from inline XML specified in the property. - 可以在中指定任何 XSLT 转换或属性。No XSLT transformation can be specified in the or properties. - 方法不会处理并发保存操作的不同请求。The method does not handle concurrent save operations by different requests. 如果多个用户正在编辑 XML 文件通过，所有用户都使用相同的数据在都操作不能保证。If more than one user is editing an XML file through the , there is no guarantee that all users are operating with the same data. 也可能是操作由于这些相同的并发问题而失败。It is also possible for a operation to fail due to these same concurrency issues. ## 指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation 使用 XML 数据执行一项常用操作将其转换从一个 XML 数据集中到另一个。A common operation performed with XML data is transforming it from one XML data set into another. 控件支持的 XML 转换和属性，指定要应用于 XML 数据传递到的数据绑定控件前一个 XSL 样式表，与属性，使你可以提供动态的 XSLT 样式表参数以供一个 XSL 样式表在转换期间。The control supports XML transformations with the and properties, which specify an XSL style sheet to apply to XML data before it is passed to a data-bound control, and the property, which enables you to supply dynamic XSLT style sheet arguments to be used by an XSL style sheet during the transformation. 如果指定筛选表达式使用 XPath属性，它应用转换发生后。If you specify an XPath filtering expression using the property, it is applied after the transformation takes place. > [!NOTE] > 类使用不推荐使用类来执行 XSL 转换。The class uses the deprecated class to perform XSL transformations. 如果你想要使用后引入的样式表功能类已弃用，通过使用手动应用转换类。If you want to use style sheet features that were introduced after the class was deprecated, apply the transforms manually by using the class. ## 使用 XPath 表达式进行筛选Filtering using an XPath Expression 默认情况下，控件加载由标识的 XML 文件中的所有 XML 数据属性或在中的找到的内联属性，但你可以使用 XPath 表达式对数据进行筛选。By default, the control loads all the XML data in the XML file identified by the property or found inline in the property, but you can filter the data using an XPath expression. 属性支持在完成加载 XML 数据并将其转换后应用的 XPath 语法筛选器。The property supports an XPath-syntax filter that is applied after XML data is loaded and transformed. ## 缓存Caching 出于性能，在为启用缓存默认情况下的控件。For performance purposes, caching is enabled for the control by default. 打开和读取 XML 文件服务器上的，每次在页请求可以减少你的应用程序的性能。Opening and reading an XML file on the server every time a page requested can reduce the performance of your application. 缓存允许你减少的处理负荷代价 Web 服务器; 上的内存是服务器上在大多数情况下这是一个良好的平衡。Caching lets you reduce the processing load on your server at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases this is a good trade-off. 自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`，和属性设置为前缓存失效的缓存中存储数据的秒数。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true`, and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is invalidated. 你可以使用以进一步微调数据源控件的缓存行为。You can use the to further fine-tune the caching behavior of the data source control. ## 其他功能Additional Features 下表列出了支持的其他功能控件。The following table lists additional features that are supported by the control. |功能Capability|描述Description| |----------------|-----------------| |排序Sorting|不支持控件。Not supported by the control.| |筛选Filtering|可以使用属性来筛选使用相应的 XPath 表达式的 XML 数据。The property can be used to filter the XML data using an appropriate XPath expression.| |分页Paging|不支持控件。Not supported by the control.| |UpdatingUpdating|支持的操作直接，然后再调用方法。Supported by manipulating the directly and then calling the method.| |正在删除Deleting|支持的操作直接，然后再调用方法。Supported by manipulating the directly and then calling the method.| |插入Inserting|支持的操作直接，然后再调用方法。Supported by manipulating the directly and then calling the method.| |缓存Caching|默认情况下，启用与属性设置为 0 （无限） 和属性设置为。Enabled by default, with the property set to 0 (infinite) and the property set to .| ## 数据视图对象Data View Object 因为控件支持数据绑定控件显示分层数据和显示表格数据控件，数据源控件在其基础 XML 数据上支持多个类型的数据源视图对象。Because the control supports data-bound controls that display hierarchical data as well as controls that display tabular data, the data source control supports multiple types of data source view objects on its underlying XML data. 控件中检索单个名为对象显示表格格式数据的数据绑定控件一起使用时。The control retrieves a single named object when used with a data-bound control that displays tabular data. 方法标识此单个命名视图。The method identifies this single named view. 如果用于显示分层数据的数据绑定控件控制检索任何唯一的层次结构路径传递给方法。When used with a data-bound control that displays hierarchical data, the control retrieves an for any unique hierarchical path passed to the method. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下情况适用时控件将自动缓存数据：The control automatically caches data when the following applies: - 属性设置为 `true`。The property is set to `true`. - 属性设置为一个值大于 0，表示缓存失效前缓存中存储数据的秒数。The property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is invalidated. 任何将更改为属性或包含 XML 数据文件的内容会导致缓存失效。Any change to the property or the contents of the file that contains the XML data causes the cache to be invalidated. 默认情况下，属性设置为 0，表示无限期的缓存，并且数据源将缓存数据，直到它依赖于在 XML 文件更改。By default, the property is set to 0, which indicates an indefinite cache, and the data source will cache data until the XML file that it depends on is changed. 缓存的行为受持续时间的组合和设置。The behavior of the cache is governed by a combination of the duration and the setting. 如果设置为、控制缓存上的第一个数据检索操作的数据、 将其保留在内存中保留指定的时间，并使其无效后具有经过的时间。If is set to , the control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for the amount of time specified by , and invalidates it after the time has lapsed. 然后在下一步操作时刷新缓存。The cache is then refreshed upon the next operation. 如果设置为，数据源控件在第一个数据检索操作上, 缓存数据，但将重置为在每个后续操作时的缓存的时间范围。If is set to , the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for upon each subsequent operation. 缓存仅将过期，如果没有任何活动时间等于自上次数据检索。The cache will only expire if there is no activity for a time equal to the since the last data retrieval. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何启用缓存时使用控件来显示 XML 文件中包含的数据。The following code example demonstrates how to enable caching when using the control to display data contained in an XML file. 启用缓存时属性设置为`true`和设置为数据缓存的数据源控件的秒数。Caching is enabled when the property is set to `true` and the is set to the number of seconds that the data is cached by the data source control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 数据被缓存，从缓存而不是从基础数据文件中检索数据。While data is cached, the retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying data file. 在缓存过期，将从基础文件中检索数据，并重新缓存的数据。When the cache expires, it retrieves data from the underlying file and re-caches the data. 你可以设置要创建之间创建的所有缓存项的依赖项属性控件和密钥。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries created by the control and the key. 通过使密钥过期可以以编程方式使所有缓存条目都无效在任何时间。You can programmatically invalidate all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key. 由于用于创建的属性，很可能多个控件可以使用，它们是从相同的 XML 文件加载相同数据和转换文件并具有相同的方案中的同一缓存和设置。Because of the properties used to create the , it is possible that multiple controls can use the same cache in scenarios where they load the same data from the same XML file and transform file and have the same and set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在声明性方案中，属性指定为多行的内部属性对象。In declarative scenarios, the property is specified as a multiline inner property of the object. 内部属性是与 XML 数据兼容，因为它使您能够设置以任何方式 XML 数据的格式并忽略字符填充问题，例如填充引号字符。An inner property is compatible with XML data, because it enables you to format the XML data in any way and ignore character padding issues, such as padding quote characters. 如果这两个和设置属性，属性优先和 XML 文件中的数据使用而不是中指定的 XML 数据属性。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence and the data in the XML file is used instead of the XML data specified in the property. 如果你更改的值属性，引发事件。If you change the value of the property, the event is raised. 如果启用了缓存并更改的值，缓存失效。If caching is enabled and you change the value of , the cache is invalidated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来显示包含内联 XML 数据具有属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to display inline XML data contained by the property with a control.
